name: Sticky Keys (JohnLee Cooper)
description:
This is a local multiplayer party game for 2-30+ players. Just pick a key (number, letter, symbol) and go to town. tap your button to move straight, or wait for your spider to turn. Surround other players with web to DESTROY them.

I say cancelled because as far as I know we've lost the source files for this game. So there are some bugs (ha) but I can't go back and fix them :(

By JohnLee Cooper, Luke Archbell, and Austin Waterson.
